iavt::CFireGrabAcquisitionComp Class Reference

AVT based camera component implementing interfaces iproc::IBitmapAcquisition and icam::IExposureConstraints for exposure control support. More...

#include <CFireGrabAcquisitionComp.h>

Detailed Description

AVT based camera component implementing interfaces iproc::IBitmapAcquisition and icam::IExposureConstraints for exposure control support.
